name: Sara Passino
comment: So fun, offline use for chromebooks which is nice because it doesn't take you to another website instead it just downloads

name: Bill Storms
comment: Scurry is what keeps me from getting any work done. Argh!!!!

name: santii Vlogs
comment: It's a very good game and very entertaining

name: Maruki (•⊙ω⊙•)
comment: scurry is so cool! That roach is so cute! I think I'll never kill one ever again!

name: Two Dash Stash
comment: It's like BIT.TRIP RUNNER with a cockroach in a grocery store.

name: Yami NoHime
comment: Gahd it's the best game ever! And it's my first time to wish cockroaches won't die.

name: ElvisRaygun
comment: Manic fun. I was playing this with my son today. It's very challenging and fun to play with a friend.

name: YAY gaming
comment: Thanks for introducing me to the cutest roach I ever did see.﻿

name: Lucy Morris
comment: even my cold, hardened heart has to warm slightly to the adorable cockroach that leaps about on your screen as you play Scurry.

name: Christopher Skinner
comment: Excellent, really fun to play during class
